itunes:title: Jupiter and the Bee (Premium)
itunes:author: Slumber Studios
itunes:subtitle:
Narrated by Abbe Opher. A queen bee learns about the joy of giving in this dreamy retelling of the myth, Jupiter and the Bee.

This is a preview episode. Get the full episode, and many more, ad free, on our supporter's feed: https://getsleepy.com/support.
